Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: Access to host network
Misconfigurations.Description: Sharing the host’s network namespace permits processes in the pod to communicate with processes bound to the host’s loopback adapter.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'resources.requests.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Privileged
Misconfigurations.Description: Privileged containers share namespaces with the host system and do not offer any security. They should be used exclusively for system containers that require high privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'securityContext.privileged' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Specific capabilities added
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Capabilities', capabilities beyond the default set must not be added.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'smarter-cni' of DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should not set 'securityContext.capabilities.add'

Misconfigurations.Title: hostPath volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'HostPath Volumes', HostPath volumes must be forbidden.
Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'smarter-cni' should not set 'spec.template.volumes.hostPath'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container smarter-cni of daemonset smarter-cni in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap smarter-cni-config in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset smarter-cni in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: SYS_MODULE capability added
Misconfigurations.Description: The SYS_MODULE capability grants attackers the ability to install and remove kernel modules, posing serious security risks.
Misconfigurations.Message: container {"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 47, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 26}, "env": [{"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 44, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 43}, "name": "DEST_DIR", "value": "/opt/cni/bin"}], "envFrom": [{"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 47, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 46}, "configMapRef": {"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 47, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 47}, "name": "smarter-cni-config"}}], "image": "ghcr.io/smarter-project/smarter-cni:v1.34.4", "imagePullPolicy": "IfNotPresent", "name": "smarter-cni", "securityContext": {"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 34, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 30}, "capabilities": {"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 33, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 31}, "add": ["NET_ADMIN", "SYS_MODULE"]}, "privileged": true}, "volumeMounts": [{"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 37, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 36}, "mountPath": "/opt/cni", "name": "cni-path"}, {"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 39, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 38}, "mountPath": "/etc/cni", "name": "etc-cni-netd"}, {"__defsec_metadata": {"endline": 41, "filepath": "charts/smarter-cni/templates/daemonset.yaml", "offset": 0, "startline": 40}, "mountPath": "/usr/libexec/cni", "name": "alt-cni-path"}]} of daemonset smarter-cni in default namespace should not include 'SYS_MODULE' in securityContext.capabilities.add
Misconfigurations.Resolution: To mitigate potential security risks, it is strongly recommended to remove the SYS_MODULE capability from 'containers[].securityContext.capabilities.add'. It is advisable to follow the practice of dropping all capabilities and only adding the necessary ones.

Misconfigurations.Title: Access to host network

Misconfigurations.Message: DaemonSet 'smarter-device-manager' should not set 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container smarter-device-manager of daemonset smarter-device-manager in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset smarter-device-manager in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Kubernetes resource with disallowed volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: HostPath present many security risks and as a security practice it is better to avoid critical host paths mounts.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset smarter-device-manager in default namespace shouldn't have volumes set to {"/dev", "/sys"}
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not Set 'spec.volumes[*].hostPath.path' to any of the disallowed volumes.

Misconfigurations.Title: Prevent binding to privileged ports
Misconfigurations.Description: The ports which are lower than 1024 receive and transmit various sensitive and privileged data. Allowing containers to use them can bring serious implications.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset smarter-dns in default namespace should not set spec.template.spec.containers.ports.containerPort to less than 1024
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not map the container ports to privileged host ports when starting a container.
